overview:
Mr. Berrios has had 16 years of extensive technology leadership and business experience as Chief Technology Officer of several Internet Media and technology services companies.

Currenty co-founder and CTO of in2apps.com a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform provides a new delivery model for online publishers to immediately and effortlessly deploy, at no cost, powerful enterprise level Distributed Rich Internet Applications(DRIA) for social networking, online classifieds, self service advertising, media management and sharing, single sign-on and more, facilitating greater community interaction by actively engaging larger audiences of like-minded users, to increase content, community and commerce. (www.in2apps.com)

In 2001, Mr. Berrios founded and served as CTO of inTRUST Technologies, a full service IT solutions provider, Prior to founded inTRUST, Mr. Berrios served as CTO for UGO Networks Inc. In this capacity Mr. Berrios built UGO Networks technology infrastructure and built, deployed and managed the data centers of UGO Technology Solutions, a service provider for hosting and managed services. In addition, Mr. Berrios developed UGO’s advertising distribution affiliate network and oversaw UGO’s e-commerce initiatives. Prior to joining UGO Networks, Mr. Berrios held the CTO positions of several online gaming startups; ActionWorld, Playlink.com and Gamedealer.com. Prior to joining the Internet craze, Mr. Berrios worked at ICON CMT, a premier network operations company, as a Senior Security Engineer on the Advanced Implementation Team, as part of which he consulted several Fortune 500 companies and designed, built and managed their business technology infrastructures.
